3.title: What are not inventions
3.judgement: Any invention which is frivolous or contrary to natural laws is not patentable.

10.title: Contents of specification
10.judgement: The complete specification must fully and particularly describe the invention and its method of performance.

16.title: Divisional applications
16.judgement: Applicant may divide application if multiple inventions are disclosed.

25.title: Opposition to grant of patent
25.judgement: Third parties may oppose grant of patent on various grounds.

64.title: Revocation of patent
64.judgement: A granted patent can be revoked by court on specific grounds.
